channel.description: Recent content in video on Corinne Chin | Video Journalist

item.title: About
item.description: Corinne Chin is a Senior Video Journalist at The Seattle Times – winner of the 2019 Edward R. Murrow Award for Overall Excellence – and the founder and leader of the newsroom’s <a href=”http://st.news/inclusive-journalism“>Diversity & Inclusion Task Force. As a storyteller, she focuses on in-depth video projects like <a href=”https://projects.seattletimes.com/2019/beyond-the-border-life-in-mexico-city-after-deportation/“>Beyond the Border, a 2019 series of visual stories <a href=”http://st.news/asylum-tijuana“>exploring immigrationand <a href=”https://www.seattletimes.com/seattle-news/life-after-deportation-a-family-with-roots-in-the-seattle-region-starts-over-in-mexico/“>deportationsupported by the International Women’s Media Foundation and the Pulitzer Center on Crisis Reporting; and <a href=”http://st.
